description: Try our easy to follow Beef Goulash With Roasted Potatoes & Buttered Spinach recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Stew,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,Potato,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Beef Goulash With Roasted Potatoes & Buttered Spinach Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Dry potatoes with paper towel. Toss in a bowl with 1 tbs of the oil and 1 tsp salt flakes. Place on an oven tray and bake for 20 minutes while you prepare the beef.
Meanwhile, heat 1 tbs of the oil in a heatproof casserole dish over high heat. Sear the beef in batches until browned on all sides. Set aside.

Add remaining oil to same pan. Add onion, capsicum and garlic, cover and cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally until softened. Add paprika and flour and stir well for 1 minute. Gradually stir in stock.
Return beef to pan and bring to the boil. Cover and bake for 30 minutes, along with potatoes, until beef is tender and potatoes are golden.

Just before serving, melt butter in a deep frying pan, add spinach and stir gently for about 2 minutes over high heat or until wilted. Season to taste. Stir sour cream into goulash and serve with potatoes and spinach. Garnish with parsley.
